FILETIME=[76FCF130:01C788CD] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
It has been brought to our attention that a site hosted by your company
is 
allowing networking for illegal file sharing of copywritten materials. 
 
This is the infringing site : 
Domain name: WERELIST.COM 
 
Registrant Contact: 
 
Coyote Osborne (coyote@coyoteoldone.com) 
+1.9493877171 
Fax: 
3900 Parkview Lane, #16C 
Irvine, CA 92612 
US 
 
---------------- 
 
Copyright Infringement issue: 
COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT / ILLEGAL FILE SHARING 
User mass emailing and offering illegal downloads of unauthorized 
copywritten material: 
"Well, they forced my webhost to pull the PDF down. Anyone who has it is

encouraged to spread it around. And if anyone wants a copy, I'll be
happy to 
email it to you. 
davensjournal (at) gmail (dot) com" 
 
LOCATION: 
from : 
http://www.werelist.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=2159&postdays=0&postorder
=asc&start=15&sid=209e05ef41765cf29a8a72a311602933 
 
 
IDENTIFICATION: 
I am the author & publisher of said work, and own said copyright. If you

view the file, it even says there that the copyright is owned by me and
my 
company. 
 
Contact information: 
Natasha Thompson (writes under the name Natassja Noctis). 9173 So.
Burnside, 
Chicago IL 60619 usa 
EMAIL: noctiscultus@yahoo.com 
This is the email associated with my registration as as ASCAP publisher.

Phone:708-753-6478 
Alt Phone: 708-283-9281 
 
 
INFRINGED WORK: "The Therian Bible" by Natassja Noctis, which is NOT,
and 
has never been available for a free download. 
 
A PDF of my work, "The Therian Bible" by Natassja Noctis is being
offered 
via email and free download on the infringing site. 
 
I have never offered any person or company use of my copywritten work ,
thus 
I do have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner 
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or
the 
law. 
 
 
I state that all of this information is 100% accurate. 
 
Electronic Signature: 
N. Thompson
